reviewText: Bad collection, some of the movies are not Italian.  Look elsewhere as the quality of the prints is not worth it.

CAVEAT: My experience with TGG DIRECT is quality of their dubs varies from good to not so. Some extras are included on multi-film collections. What's NOT here are any annoying on-screen logos. Also from TGG: 20 GREAT WESTERNS: HEROES & BANDITS offers a couple of these plus six other Euro-oaters. The balance are American made pictures that span the years 1933 to '77. . PROGRAM-- (Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 IMDb viewer poll ratings.) DISC ONE: (5.6) Boot Hill (Italy-1969) - Terence Hill/Woody Strode/Bud Spencer/Victor Buono/Lionel Stander (6.1) Any Gun Can Play (Italy-1967) - Edd Byrnes/George Hilton/Gilbert Roland BONUS: Film info; Terence Hill bio; Bud Spencer bio; facts & trivia; photo gallery DISC TWO: (3.9) Savage Guns (Italy-1971) - Robert Woods/Dino Strano/Benito Pacifico (uncredited: Gordon Mitchell) (5.5) Find a Place to Die (Italy-1968) - Jeffrey Hunter/Pascale Petit/Giovanni Pallavicino (3.9) White Comanche (Spain-1968) - Joseph Cotton/William Shatner/Rosanna Yanni BONUS: Film info; Jeffrey Hunter bio; facts & trivia; photo gallery
